name: stymie
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to prevent something from happening or someone from achieving a purpose: In our search for evidence, we were stymied by the absence of any recent documents. Synonym
block

Add to word list
Add to word list
to prevent someone from achieving a goal or doing something that had been planned: Students were stymied by the test.
